text:
Did you know that @Eskom_SA reduced it's installed capacity from 48GW to 46.5GW due to early shutdown of units at Grootvlei, Hendrina & Komati.
They also have DuvhaU3 that is not been recovered.
Consequently, reserve margin is significantly lower than 23%.
Hence loadshedding risk

text: I stay in a suburb called Klippoortjie Park Germiston, almost ever week we have unannounced loadshedding or do the municipality call it blackout. Every time we are told thieves stole cables, today it’s copper. We have no power since yesterday evening at 20:15, no word
text_html: I stay in a suburb called Klippoortjie Park Germiston, almost ever week we have unannounced loadshedding or do the municipality call it blackout. Every time we are told thieves stole cables, today it’s copper. We have no power since yesterday evening at 20:15, no word

text:
You would think on days where there is routine maintenance we would be spared from scheduled loadshedding. Nope. Here we are. It’s 5:30. We lost power at 8am. 

A joke. A whole joke!
